'''Water Imp Prince''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Water Imp Prince can be obtained during the [[Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures]] event.

==Trivia==
* The Morse code sequences featured in the item description can be translated into three distinct French words encoded in {{w|Caesar cipher}} with a right shift of one, which are respectively the following:
** <code>- ..-. ...- --</code> {{fr|Seul|Alone}}
** <code>... ..-. .-- ..-. ...</code> {{fr|Rêver|to dream}}
** <code>-. .--- ... -... -.. -- ..-.</code> {{fr|Miracle|Miracle}}
